name: url-detection-in-terminal-cells
description: groupCellsIntoSegments() joins cell chars, runs text.matchAll() with URL regex (https?://, ftp://, www.), trims trailing prose punctuation, slices cells into CellSegment[] typed unions (text|url). URL segments render as anchor tags with target=_blank rel=noopener. ESLint no-control-regex disallows \x00-\x1f in regex â€” use [^\s<>] for URL boundary detection instead.

name: clickable-url-confirmation-modal
description: ExternalLinkModal: confirmation modal for terminal URL clicks. useEffect keydown (Enter=confirm, Esc=cancel), stopPropagation on modal body, window.open with URL() protocol validation (http/https/ftp only) + noopener,noreferrer. Rendered via React fragment sibling to terminal div in CustomTerminalWrapper. groupCellsIntoSegments() fast-paths on '://' and 'www.' absence before running URL_REGEX.
